1535090.name: VR Kyoto: Beauty of Japan
1535090.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese beautiful places / towns for about 20 minutes.
You will find japanese ladies, streets, towns and gardens.
There is not much interactivity, so you can't grab things at the moment. It is a tour.
Enjoy 20 minutes walk in Japan!
In the game, you will be able to move freely, enter open rooms, visit the streets, towns and temples, to achieve a relaxing and enjoyable walking tour.

Instructions:
Movement: The trigger button of the right controller for movement; press the touchpad of the right controller to turn left and right.
MENU: Menu button on the left controller for menu; press trigger button of the left controller to selcect.
1535090.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
